title: File dirtied by code assist without actual changes
description: When using code assist, the file is dirtied but no changes are made. As a result, code assist does not appear.
OB: When using code assist, the file is dirtied without any actual changes being made, and code assist does not appear.
EB: When using code assist, the file should not be dirtied if no changes are made. Code assist should appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Observe if the file is dirtied and if code assist appears.
